sentences.en: And also, the realtor will inspect the house.
sentences.cn: 而且经纪人也会检查房子.

sentences.en: Finding a house to buy was complicated enough. But that's nothing compared to all the paperwork my realtor is asking me to sign.
sentences.cn: 这个人说，找到合适的房子已经够麻烦的了，但这跟经纪人让我签字的那些文件相比，简直就是小巫见大巫。

sentences.en: He will have to pay a commission to the realtor.
In england they call a realtor a land agent .
sentences.cn: 在英国他们叫作房地产经纪人。

sentences.en: Only if you can read Chinese. These shops are restaurants, realtor, acupuncture, clinics, building materials and furniture stores. This is a sensationalized news piece.
sentences.cn: 如果你认识中文，你会发现这些商铺是餐馆、房产中介公司、针灸按摩、诊所、建材和家具店。这是一篇耸人听闻的新闻。

sentences.en: So I went to a realtor. And I liked this area, the shopping street.
sentences.cn: 很喜欢这个地区, 这一条商店街, 于是去找地产经纪.

sentences.en: TANYA: But doesn't a realtor help with the contract?
sentences.cn: 妲雅: 不过经纪人也会帮忙合约的事啊?

sentences.en: The realtor said another couple made an offer.
sentences.cn: 经纪人不是说还有另外一对夫妇有意购买吗?

sentences.en: The realtor took her on a walk - through of the apartment.
sentences.cn: 那位房地产经济人领着她四处看了一下那间公寓.

trans.tran_cn: <美>房地产经纪人，（尤指）美国房地产同业公会成员
trans.tran_en: A Realtor is a person whose job is to sell houses, buildings, and land, and who is a member of the National Association of Realtors
